descriptionHtml:
*HANDY MAGIC : ORIGINAL EDITION*


2x less spamming for your preferred Alteration spells!

HandyMagic:Original Edition doubles the duration of Candlelight, Magelight, Oakflesh, Stoneflesh, Ironflesh, Ebonyflesh, Waterbreathing. Mana costs unchanged!

Available Now!

-------------------------------------------------

*HANDY MAGIC : BALANCED EDITION*


Build to provide you with a better gaming experience as a magic user.
Very straightforward. Fully preserves Vanilla feeling.


WHAT IT DOES:
- Doubles the duration of Candlelight, Magelight, Oakflesh, Stoneflesh, Ironflesh, Ebonyflesh, Waterbreathing. Mana costs unchanged!
- Adds \"Destruction Scaling\" perk to the Destruction tree: the damage of Destruction spells now scales off Destruction skill level. +1% damage per level. (means +100% damage at Destruction skill level 100)
- Reduces stagger chance of the Impact perk from 100% to 50%.
- Increases combat magicka regen to 50% from 33% in vanilla and decreases dual-cast cost to 2.5x from 2.8x in vanilla.


RECOMMENDED:
If you don\'t want to spend a perk point in Destruction Scaling: 
open console
type \"help scaling\" : this gives you the perk ID
type \"player.addperk ID\" where \"ID\" is the actual perk ID!
profit


INSTALL/UNINSTALL:
There is only one file in the archive: the .esp file. 
Unpackage and copy it in the Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder to install.
Delete it to uninstall.
Or just use Nexus Mod Manager.


CHANGELOG:
v0.11: changed Destruction Scaling perk description to hopefully fit better with other perk descriptions.
v0.12: fixed Destruction Scaling, it now works as intended and only applies its bonus to Destruction spells.
v0.12b: added HandyMagic_NoBalance as an Optional File. Only doubles the duration of listed Alteration spells, no Destruction balance.
v1.0: Impact stagger chance reduced from 50 to 25%. Combat magicka regen increased to 50%. Dual-cast cost decreased to 2.5x. NoBalance edition renamed to Original edition.
v1.1: Reverted Impact stagger chance to 50% from 25%. I felt that 25% was too low for the huge fireballs we\'re actually shooting; if it wasn\'t for realism, I would stick with 25% because it adds to the challenge. v1.0 still available as an optional file.


If you like this mod, please endorse it.
